variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a proline to leucine substitution.
This variant results in a valine to isoleucine substitution.

Material used.Description: Lysates were prepared from the brain tissue of PINK1 knockout mice.

Readout description.Result Description: Co-immunoprecipitation showed a significant reduction in PINK1 interaction with Parkin in PINK1 knockout mice compared to wild type controls.
Co-immunoprecipitation showed a significant reduction in PINK1 interaction with Parkin in PINK1 knockout mice compared to wild type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent mouse lines were used.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was performed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mouse brain tissue was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Mock immunoprecipitation was performed as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Clear band detected in Western blot for normal interactions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence or significantly reduced band detected in Western blot for interactions
